edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.HistogramBinSelection

edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.HistogramBinSelection Class Reference

Tries out different values for the number of bins and replaces each pixel value by the center of its bin. More...

Detailed Description

Tries out different values for the number of bins and replaces each pixel value by the center of its bin.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

replaces each pixel by the center of its bin 

00029                                                                   {
00030         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data);
00031         int nrows = result.getNumLat();
00032         int ncols = result.getNumLon();
00033         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00034             int bin_no = hist.getBinNumber(data.getValue(i,j), data.getMissing());
00035             int cval = hist.getCenterValue(bin_no, data.getMissing());
00036             result.setValue(i,j, cval);
00037         }
00038         return result;
00039     }

static Histogram edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnNumSamples ( LatLonGrid  data  )  [static]

Based on range. 

00125                                                                     {
00126         int min = data.getMissing();
00127         int max = data.getMissing();
00128         int N = 0;
00129         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00130         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00131         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00132             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00133             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00134                 ++N;
00135                 if (min == data.getMissing() || val < min){
00136                     min = val;
00137                 }
00138                 if (max == data.getMissing() || val > max){
00139                     max = val;
00140                 }
00141             }
00142         }
00143         int nbins = 1 + (int) Math.round(Math.sqrt(N));
00144         System.out.println("Based on N="+ N + ", nbins=" + nbins);
00145         int incr = (max-min)/nbins;
00146         if (incr == 0) incr = 1;
00147         Histogram hist = new Histogram(min,incr,nbins);
00148         hist.update(data);
00149         return hist;
00150     }

static Histogram edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnRange ( LatLonGrid  data  )  [static]

Based on range. 

00042                                                                {
00043         // find the range
00044         int min = data.getMissing();
00045         int max = data.getMissing();
00046         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00047         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00048         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00049             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00050             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00051                 if (min == data.getMissing() || val < min){
00052                     min = val;
00053                 }
00054                 if (max == data.getMissing() || val > max){
00055                     max = val;
00056                 }
00057             }
00058         }
00059         int nbins = 1 + (int) Math.round(Math.log(max-min)/Math.log(2));
00060         System.out.println("Based on range: min=" + min + " max="+ max + ", nbins=" + nbins);
00061         int incr = (max-min)/nbins;
00062         if (incr == 0) incr = 1;
00063         Histogram hist = new Histogram(min,incr,nbins);
00064         hist.update(data);
00065         return hist;
00066     }

Based on range. 

00095                                                                 {
00096         ScalarStatistic stat = new ScalarStatistic();
00097         int min = data.getMissing();
00098         int max = data.getMissing();
00099         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00100         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00101         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00102             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00103             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00104                 stat.update(val);
00105                 if (min == data.getMissing() || val < min){
00106                     min = val;
00107                 }
00108                 if (max == data.getMissing() || val > max){
00109                     max = val;
00110                 }
00111             }
00112         }
00113         double sigma = stat.getStdDeviation();
00114         int N = stat.getNumSamples();
00115         int nbins = 1 + (int) Math.round(3.5*sigma/Math.pow(N, 1.0/3));
00116         System.out.println("Based on sigma=" + sigma + " N="+ N + ", nbins=" + nbins);
00117         int incr = (max-min)/nbins;
00118         if (incr == 0) incr = 1;
00119         Histogram hist = new Histogram(min,incr,nbins);
00120         hist.update(data);
00121         return hist;
00122     }

00069                                                                     {
00070         // find the range
00071         int min = data.getMissing();
00072         int max = data.getMissing();
00073         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00074         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00075         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00076             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00077             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00078                 if (min == data.getMissing() || val < min){
00079                     min = val;
00080                 }
00081                 if (max == data.getMissing() || val > max){
00082                     max = val;
00083                 }
00084             }
00085         }
00086         System.out.println("full resolution: min=" + min + " max="+ max + ", incr=1");
00087         final int incr = 1;
00088         int nbins = (max-min)+1;
00089         Histogram hist = new Histogram(min,incr,nbins);
00090         hist.update(data);
00091         return hist;
00092     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.HistogramBinSelection.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00152                                                             {
00153         // create output directory
00154         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("histbin");
00155 
00156         // read input
00157         LatLonGrid conus = SurfaceAlbedo.read(SurfaceAlbedo.CONUS, 100);
00158 
00159         // find histogram in three different ways
00160         Map<String, Histogram> map = new HashMap<String,Histogram>();
00161         map.put("range", HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnRange(conus));
00162         map.put("numsamples", HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnNumSamples(conus));
00163         map.put("stddev", HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnStdDev(conus));
00164 
00165         for (Map.Entry<String, Histogram> entry : map.entrySet()) {
00166             Histogram hist = entry.getValue();
00167             String name = entry.getKey();
00168             
00169             String filename = outdir.getAbsolutePath() + "/hist_" + name
00170                     + ".txt";
00171             PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename));
00172             writer.println(hist);
00173             writer.close();
00174             System.out.println("Wrote to " + filename);
00175             
00176             LatLonGrid banded = HistogramBinSelection.band(conus, hist);
00177             KmlWriter.write(banded, outdir, name, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00178         }
00179     }
